summary: add Werewolf pelt, Human heart and Void salts whenever werewolf were killed! except Sinding (so far..)
descriptionHtml:
i\'m not sure if anyone make this kind of mod or not so.. here u go

add :
- Werewolf pelt
- Human heart
- Void salts
whenever werewolf were killed! except Sinding (so far..)

also add TanningRecipe
- Werewolf pet -> 5 Leather(s)

tested in GallowsRock on TheSilverHands Quest, if u can\'t find any werewolves to test this mod, use console and type this line:

help werewolf 4
player.placeatme ????????

? -> number hex-code
example: player.placeatme 0010f509

..happy hunting!


 THANKs
Bethesda, Nexus and TESVSnip
author: freakX
